ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC
ygData.msgSnippet: ... We went in Sebilis in the firsts week of Kunark and, that Mushroom poped on us at the bridge. So it is not a patch effect, it is just poor testing from
ygData.messageBody:
jhenders@... wrote:

> A very similar thing happened to us at the bridge area both yesterday
> and the day before but in our case it was ilis and krup frogs that
> popped in. They obviously broke something when they fixed the various
> pathing exploits people found in there in the last patch, because we'd
> been fighting there many times before the patch without this happening.
> Of course, because this bug in no way benefits players, don't hold your
> breath waiting for it to be fixed.

We went in Sebilis in the firsts week of Kunark and, that Mushroom poped on us at the bridge. So it is not
a patch effect, it is just poor testing from Verant. If it ever happen to your group again, i would
suggest /bug'ing it.

Now we just make sure we don't fight/stay at the bridge.

Happy hunting,

--
Benoit St-Hilaire
bsthilai@...
